current.product_shipping:
How much is shipping?

It's FREE, ZERO, ZILCH, ZIP, NOTHING...we've got you covered!
There's nothing worse than going to the trouble of researching what you think the best option of CBD is for you, getting to the checkout page, entering your email and postal address, then all of a sudden being hit with an overpriced shipping fee...we get it, we hate it too. That's why we provide TRACKED TWO-DAY SHIPPING on ALL ORDERS!

Here's what to expect when you place your order.

FREE TWO-DAY TRACKED SHIPPING

1) As soon as your payment is complete, it's sent over to our fulfillment warehouse where it's picked and packed on the same day (if you order before 2pm GMT).

2) Then, after it's picked up by our couriers, we send you an email to confirm with a tracking number so that you know exactly where it is at all times.

NEXT-DAY TRACKED SHIPPING

1) If you're wanting to get it delivered the next day after you place your order (before 2pm) then that's an option as well. All you have to do is select 'Next-Day' for £4.50 when you're placing your order and we'll take care of the rest for you.

2) We send you an email to confirm with a tracking number so that you know exactly where it is at all times. If you have any other questions, you can always contact one of our team at talk@truthnaturals.co.uk and we'll get back to you ASAP.

Returns

In the incredibly unlikely event that you're not 100% satisfied with your order please contact us by email on talk@truthnaturals.co.uk within 14 days of receiving the product. All of our products carry a 14-day customer satisfaction guarantee.
current.product_faq:
So, you have some questions? That's understandable - we would be pretty surprised if you didn't! That's why we've thrown together this list of frequently asked question that you may have...but keep in mind, we sell CBD as a food supplement and not medicine, so there are some things we’re unable to say about the extent of CBD benefits. We’ve done the best we could to answer most of them, but if you still have have questions, then feel free to email us at talk@truthnaturals.co.uk.

WHAT IS CBD OIL?

 Cannabidiol (CBD) is the lesser known naturally-occurring compound found in hemp and cannabis, also known as a cannabinoid. It’s the most abundant *non-psychoactive cannabinoid found in the plant and is thought to have a wealth of benefits.  
*not affecting the mind or mental processes. 

HOW SHOULD I TAKE CBD?

This really comes down to personal preference, as well as the reasons why you want to try CBD. Here are the options: 

1. Tinctures
Tinctures come in dropper bottles and can be taken through a dropper directly into the mouth or mixed into food or drink. Our Tinctures are created using hemp oil and mixed with MCT / coconut oil.  All ingredients are top-quality and organic and come in different concentrations; 250mg, 500mg, 1000mg & 1500mg.
2. Liposomes
The latest nano technology in CBD consumption in the UK. This scientific breakthrough has dramatically increased the bio availability of CBD by using natural phospholipids that support cellular health and rapidly deliver CBD oil directly into cells. In other words, each mg of Liposomes CBD is 5-10 times stronger in CBD effectiveness. Our Liposomes come in 100mg & 300mg, and are made with CBD.

3. Capsules
Capsules are a very effective way to take CBD. They’re designed only to open once they’re in your gut, where they’re absorbed into the bloodstream - none of the potency is lost. Our Capsules come in 10mg and 25mg and contain other phytocannabinoids such as CBG, CBN, CBC, and over 40 naturally-present terpenes. 
4. Gummies
If you prefer the idea of edibles, gummies are a good way to get CBD into your system. Our Gummies are infused with CDB and are not dipped or coated, so none of the nutrients are lost before they reach your gut. 

HOW MUCH CBD SHOULD I TAKE?

We can’t tell you how much to take – that’s up to you. Some people find an effective dose is as little as a few milligrams. Others, a gram or more. Our advice is to start small, especially if you have little or no experience of CBD. If you want to increase it, take a few small doses over the course of the day rather than one big dose, and repeat the same amount and timing for several days. 

Take note of the effects and adjust it if necessary. 
Don’t overdo it – not because it’s dangerous, but because CBD has bi-phasic properties, which means that low and high doses can produce opposite effects. 

A good rule to remember is: small doses tend to stimulate, large doses sedate. 

CBD has no known adverse effects, but an excessive amount of CBD could be less effective therapeutically than a moderate dose. So, remember: ‘less is more’ is often the case with CBD!

HOW LONG UNTIL I FEEL THE EFFECTS?

It could range from around 10-20 minutes for sublingual products, to an hour or so for anything you consume.Remember that everyone responds differently, so it’s best to start low and work up in serving size. 

ARE THERE ANY SIDE EFFECTS?

As we mentioned above, CBD is a very safe substance with no known adverse effects, but if you’re taking other medications, check with your doctor about interactions. 
At sufficient doses, CBD can alter how we metabolise some compounds (including THC). As a general guide, if grapefruit affects your medication, CBD might do too. Also, bear in mind that everyone reacts differently to food supplements - or indeed any change in diet. It all depends on how you personally tolerate and adapt to CBD.


Visit our FAQ's Page for more...

settings.section_title: Compare to Other Truth CBD Products

settings.title: What is CBD?
settings.text:
The short answer:

Cannabidiol (CBD) is a naturally-occurring compound found in hemp and cannabis, also known as a cannabinoid. It’s the most abundant non-psychoactive cannabinoid found in the plant and is thought to have a wealth of benefits. We sell CBD as a food supplement, so we don’t make any medicinal claims, but we encourage you to do your own research using reputable websites.

The long answer:

Cannabidiol (CBD) is a cannabinoid and one of the two most plentiful in the Cannabis plant. The other is delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol - commonly known as THC.

THC is what gives cannabis its psychoactive effects - i.e. THC is what causes smokers of cannabis to get “high”. CBD, on the other hand, does not affect users in the same way - it does not have any psychoactive properties, and it’s thought that it offers a wealth of benefits.

Different strains of the cannabis plant offer different concentrations of CBD and THC. Hemp - which is part of the cannabis plant, defined as the stalks, stems and seeds - is selectively bred for its strong leaves and stalks (rather than the flowers, where the most THC is found) and contains substantial amounts of CBD and very small amounts of THC.

Marijuana plants contain over 80 other cannabinoids, however they’re found in such small concentrations in comparison to CBD and THC that not much research has been carried out around them.

Research surrounding the benefits of CBD is still in its infancy, but more and more well-respected establishments are beginning to conduct in-depth scientific studies.

settings.title: How do I take CBD?
settings.text:
This really comes down to personal preference, as well as the reasons why you want to try CBD. Here are the options:

1. Tinctures

CBD Tinctures come in dropper bottles and can be taken through a dropper directly into the mouth or mixed into food or drink. Our Tinctures are created using CBD hemp oil and diluted with MCT / coconut oil. All ingredients are top-quality and organic and come in different concentrations; 250mg, 500mg, 1000mg, 1500mg and 3600mg.

2. Liposomes

The latest science in absorption bioavailability in CBD consumption in the UK. This scientific breakthrough has dramatically increased the bioavailability of CBD by using natural phospholipids that support cellular health and rapidly deliver CBD oil directly into cells. In other words, each mg of CBD Liposomes is 5-10 times stronger in CBD effectiveness. Our Liposomes come in 100mg, 300mg and 1000mg, and are made with organic-farmed hemp oil CBD.

3. Capsules

Capsules are a very effective way to take CBD. They’re designed only to open once they’re in your gut, where they’re absorbed into the bloodstream - none of the potency is lost. Our CBD Gel Capsules come in 10mg and 25mg and contain other phytocannabinoids such as CBG, CBN, CBC, and over 40 naturally-present terpenes.

4. Gummies

If you prefer the idea of edibles, gummies are a good way to get CBD into your system. Our CBD-infused gummies are infused with CBD and are not dipped or coated, so none of the nutrients are lost before they reach your gut.

settings.title: What is the Endocannabinoid System?
settings.text:
The body’s endocannabinoid system (ECS) is a massive network of cell receptor proteins that deal with just about anything the body is or does, including mood, memory, motor control, immune function, reproduction, pain perception, appetite, sleep, and bone development, to name but a few.

Because CBD oil works naturally with the ECS, the list of things CBD could benefit is huge. Check out our blogs for more info!

settings.title: Is CBD (Cannabidiol) Legal?
settings.text: Yes, CBD is legal in the UK, and in many countries around the world. In the UK, CBD products sold for a medical purpose must now be licensed. Our products are sold as food supplements, and as such we make no medical claims about their performance. We are members of the UK Cannabis Trades Association, an organisation which represents the hemp and cannabis industry in the UK and which promotes good practice to ensure consumers receive the highest quality products. We adhere to their Association Standards and fully support their work to ensure quality, transparency and good practice within the industry.

settings.title: Will I get high from taking CBD (Cannabidiol)?
settings.text:
The short answer:

No.

The more detailed answer:

CBD is non-psychoactive, so you won’t get high from cannabidiol-rich products. On the other hand, THC is a strong psychoactive substance, and will make you feel stoned.

Both CBD and THC occur naturally in hemp and cannabis, in higher or lower concentrations depending on the strain and the part of the plant. Hemp contains just tiny traces of THC, while recreational cannabis can contain anything from 2.5% up to a whopping 80% of THC. CBD oil has significant amounts of CBD and little or no THC.

THC interacts directly with the body’s cannabinoid receptors, and due to its chemical similarities to one of the body’s natural endocannabinoids, anandamide (also known as the Bliss Molecule) - THC works directly with the same receptors, and results in producing a “high”.

CBD works slightly differently, and affects the endocannabinoid system both by directly suppressing the receptors that cause a high, and indirectly by activating other receptors around the body, including serotonin, vanilloid and adenosine receptors, thus playing a role in many different functions around the body without any psychoactive effects.

Our products are thoroughly lab tested to ensure that any trace amounts of THC are completely removed.

settings.section_text:
We have researched CBD all around the world in the past decade and have watched regulations improve in the US and leading western countries. We work closely with our industry bodies, the Home Office and MHRA to ensure we continue to abide by current regulations. We also offer suggestions on future regulations to ensure UK consumers get the best possible information, to make the right choice for them.
We are currently regulated as a Food supplement, so can’t give medical advice, hopefully this will change in the future.

settings.title: Why Take CBD?
settings.text:
The short answer:
We sell CBD as a food supplement, because we believe that it has many benefits. While we don’t make any medical claims surrounding our products, we believe that adding CBD to your daily routine promotes general well being by interacting with your endocannabinoid system.

settings.title: How do you take CBD
settings.text:
This really comes down to personal preference, as well as the reasons why you want to try CBD. Here are the options:

1. Tinctures
Tinctures come in dropper bottles and can be taken through a dropper directly into the mouth or mixed into food or drink. Our Tinctures are created using CBD hemp oil and diluted with MCT / coconut oil. All ingredients are top-quality and organic and come in different concentrations; 250mg, 500mg, 1000mg and 1500mg.

2. Liposomes
The latest science in absorption bioavailability in CBD consumption in the UK. This scientific breakthrough has dramatically increased the bioavailability of CBD by using natural phospholipids that support cellular health and rapidly deliver CBD oil directly into cells. In other words, each mg of Liposomes CBD is 5-10 times stronger in CBD effectiveness. Our Liposomes come in 100mg and 300mg, and are made with organic-farmed hemp oil CBD.

3. Capsules
Capsules are a very effective way to take CBD. They’re designed only to open once they’re in your gut, where they’re absorbed into the bloodstream - none of the potency is lost. Our Capsules come in 10mg and 25mg and contain other phytocannabinoids such as CBG, CBN, CBC, and over 40 naturally-present terpenes.

4. Gummies
If you prefer the idea of edibles, gummies are a good way to get CBD into your system. Our Gummies are infused with CDB and are not dipped or coated, so none of the nutrients are lost before they reach your gut.

settings.title: What are the side effects of using CBD?
settings.text:
Hemp is considered very safe, so there shouldn’t be any significant side effects, particularly in small doses. However, as with any food supplement or dietary change, it depends on how your body adapts to it. If you have any questions concerning your health, please consult your doctor.

WILL CBD GET ME HIGH?

settings.title: Will CBD get me high as a kite?
settings.text:
The short answer:
No.
 

The more detailed answer:
CBD is non-psychoactive, so you won’t get high from cannabidiol-rich products. On the other hand, THC is a strong psychoactive substance, and will make you feel stoned.

Both CBD and THC occur naturally in hemp and cannabis, in higher or lower concentrations depending on the strain and the part of the plant. Hemp contains just tiny traces of THC, while recreational cannabis can contain anything from 2.5% up to a whopping 80% of THC. CBD oil has significant amounts of CBD and little or no THC.

THC interacts directly with the body’s cannabinoid receptors, and due to its chemical similarities to one of the body’s natural endocannabinoids, anandamide (also known as the Bliss Molecule) - THC works directly with the same receptors, and results in producing a “high”.

CBD works slightly differently, and affects the endocannabinoid system both by directly suppressing the receptors that cause a high, and indirectly by activating other receptors around the body, including serotonin, vanilloid and adenosine receptors, thus playing a role in many different functions around the body without any psychoactive effects.

Our products are thoroughly lab tested to ensure that any trace amounts of THC are completely removed.

settings.title: Is CBD Safe?
settings.text:
The short answer:
Yes
 

The more detailed answer:
Generally, hemp is considered very safe. However, some suppliers of CBD oil do not take the care and precautions that we do at Truth to ensure that the product is of the highest quality.

Our hemp is sourced from the best growers in Colorado, USA, and our products are thoroughly lab tested so that we can guarantee that our CBD oil is pure, full of all the beneficial phytocannabinoids, minerals, fatty acids and vitamins you want and without any chemicals, pesticides or heavy metals that you don’t.

settings.title: Is CBD Legal?
settings.text:
Yes, CBD is legal in the UK, and in many countries around the world. In the UK, CBD products sold for a medical purpose must now be licensed. Our products are sold as food supplements, and as such we make no medical claims about their performance.
We are members of the UK Cannabis Trades Association, an organisation which represents the hemp and cannabis industry in the UK and which promotes good practice to ensure consumers receive the highest quality products. We adhere to their Association Standards and fully support their work to ensure quality, transparency and good practice within the industry.

Will I fail a drugs test if I take CBD?
Drug tests are geared towards identifying THC, not CBD or another cannabinoid. If you take a CBD product which contains a trace amount of THC, that THC could register on a drug test.

If you’re concerned about this, make sure you only buy brands which guarantee 0% THC. All Truth Naturals products are thoroughly lab tested to ensure that any trace amounts of THC are completely removed.

settings.title: Will CBD help with my medical condition?
settings.text:
Truth Naturals sells CBD as a dietary supplement, so we make no medical claims whatsoever. CBD sold for medicinal purposes is required to be licensed under UK law. We encourage you to do your own research using reputable websites like PubMed, where you’ll find studies on the effects and benefits of cannabidiol for various conditions.

More and more research is being undertaken by well-respected scientific establishments to find out more about the benefits of CBD for specific medical conditions, and we sometimes refer to studies on our website, but only to inform you of them.

Our CBD products are not intended to treat, cure or prevent any disease.

spectrum oil, including unique terpenes.

The soluble formulation in the patented water inside of these capsules is
composed of a nanoemulsion of cannabinoids droplets of a size of about 25
nanometers. The high surface droplets maximizes absorption and
bioavailability that results is 3-5 times higher than CBD delivered as natural
and oily form.

Increased absorption gives a predictable biological
response and improved efficiency of CBD to your body’s receptors.

Guaranteed Zero THC giving you the goodness of CBD without the “high”
effect

Our current Best Seller in the UK.

Each serving (1 full dropper) contains 50mg of CBD (Cannabidiol).

Our 1500mg Zero THC formula means our products produce absolutely no
psychoactive effects, or side effects associated with THC.

Cold Processed Oil Using CO2 Extraction- Absolutely No Solvents Or
Harmful Chemicals.

This formula is mixed with MCT from Coconut Oil and is naturally rich in
Cannabidiol (CBD), and also contains Cannabigerol (CBG), Cannabinol (CBN),
Cannabichromene (CBC), as well as terpenes, flavonoids, and essential amino
acids.

INGREDIENTS Phytocannabinoid Rich Hemp Oil, Curcuminoids extracted from full spectrum turmeric DOSAGE 20mg CBD + 54mg curcuminoids per 2 ml serving SUGGESTIONS Simply squirt 1 pipette (2ml) into any drink NO CHEMICALS, NO TOXINS, NO NASTIES. Brought to you with integrity, transparency, and the simple truth.

Free 2-3 Tracked Shipping.

We hate paying for shipping, so why should we make you? 
We provide FREE TWO-DAY TRACKED SHIPPING on ALL ORDERS!

HERE'S WHAT TO EXPECT:

1) As soon as your payment is complete, it's sent over to our fulfillment warehouse where it's picked and packed on the same day (if you order before 2pm GMT).

2) Then, after it's picked up by our couriers, we send you an email to confirm with a tracking number so that you know exactly where it is at all times.

We have researched CBD all around the world in the past decade and have watched regulations improve in the US and leading western countries.

We work closely with our industry bodies, the Home Office and MHRA to ensure we continue to abide by current regulations. We also offer suggestions on
future regulations to ensure UK consumers get the best possible information, to make the right choice for them.

We are currently regulated as a Food supplement, so can’t give medical advice, hopefully this will change in the future.

settings.title: CBD Tinctures
settings.col_descr:
Tinctures come in dropper bottles and can be taken through a dropper directly into the mouth and are absorbed and easily when taken under the tongue. They can also be mixed into food or drink.

Our tinctures are made with phytocannabinoid rich hemp oil blended with MCT oil (Medium-Chain Triglycerides) from coconuts. MCT oil is easy to digest and metabolized quickly.

Tinctures are available in different concentrations: 500mg, 1500mg, 3000mg, and 5000mg.

settings.title: CBD Face Cream
settings.col_descr:
Not all topical CBD products are made equal. Many of them are not transdermal, meaning they fail to seep beyond the top 3 layers of the skin.

Truth Naturals’ Night Shift Restorative Cream penetrates through the skin and straight into your bloodstream, giving maximum effect with minimal amount.

settings.col_descr:

300mg of Full Spectrum Cannabidiol Rich Hemp Oil, Australian Eucalyptus

SUGGESTIONS
Apply it after a workout to reduce DOMS (delayed onset muscle soreness), or on a muscle strain to help natural healing. Just give it a quick roll it on sore and aching muscles, then gently massage it in. You don’t need a lot: a little goes a long way!

NO CHEMICALS, NO TOXINS, NO NASTIES.

settings.slide-tagline: 100% natural, organically grown CBD brought to you with guaranteed purity, transparency, and efficacy.
Want to try CBD but not sure which product to start with?

settings.title: A message from the founders of Truth
settings.description:
From the very beginning, it all came down to this: how can we help others to feel their best and improve their lives? Both of us had overcome so many health obstacles, including Non- Hodgkin’s lymphoma, and the one thing in common that really brought us together was our relentless pursuit of health and high performance.

So, we set off on a worldwide search for plant compounds that were scientifically robust; suppliers that used clean and ethical practices; and then used ourselves (and our team) to test for the first stage of development.

We wanted to share the power of nature at its absolute best – that is, pure and unadulterated. No funny business, no spin, just honest-to-goodness plant-power from a couple of guys that love health, science, and sharing the Truth. We’re so happy you can join us!

Always Grateful,

settings.title: Our Values
settings.subtitle: Purity. Transparency. Efficacy.
settings.description: We all live active lifestyles, and are constantly monitoring the latest trends in health, fitness and fatherhood. We think of ourselves as honest and genuine guys who continue to innovate healthy solutions to common life challenges. All of our products are supported by science as we promote the truth about the emerging power of plant based nutrition.

settings.subtitle: TEAM TRUTH
settings.title: We’re here to help!
settings.description: We put the ‘can’ in cannabidiol because your happiness is our business. If you have any issues with your product or order, let’s chat. We’ll fix it!

settings.title: EMAIL US
settings.description: Hate talking on the phone? Send us an email instead, we love to read and we also love to help. Let us know what’s on your mind!

settings.title: CHAT WITH A HUMAN
settings.description: Who wants a robot to fix their human problems? We’re all about nature, so our people are here to support you authentically and efficiently. Click on the chat icon in the bottom right to get started!

settings.title: HUMAN HOURS
settings.description:
Hours our team operates:


Monday to Friday
9am – 5pm GMT

settings.title: Send us a message…
settings.description: Emails are typically responded to within 24-48 hours, except weekends and holidays.
